Name: Baron Veynar Dros
Backstory: A reclusive noble with a ruined lineage, Veynar governs Karnstadt more out of obligation than ambition. Once a brilliant tactician, he now spends his nights staring at old maps and drinking bitter red wine. Some say he communes with spirits in his sleep.

Name: Captain Dren Hosk
Backstory: Leader of the manor guards, Dren is a rigid man with a brutal past. Rumors whisper that he once served in the penal legions. He speaks little and fears only the Baron’s temper.

Name: Guard Rellis Trune
Backstory: Rellis is young, eager, and far too curious for a guard. He often sneaks around the manor after hours, trying to overhear the advisor’s conversations. Loyal but naive.

Name: Guard Fenna Malc
Backstory: One of the few female guards, Fenna was recruited from the city watch. She is fiercely protective of the Baron, though none know why. She carries a hidden locket at all times.

Name: Guard Olan Vex
Backstory: An older veteran with a limp and a sense of humor darker than the manor’s cellars. Olan has served three generations of the Dros family and is known to drink with the servants.

Name: Steward Kell Harvan
Backstory: Kell manages the estate’s logistics and supplies. Obsessively organized and humorless, he keeps detailed ledgers of all items and people entering the manse.

Name: Steward Avelis Rune
Backstory: Responsible for correspondence and affairs of state, Avelis is charismatic and ambitious. He secretly communicates with other lords, testing the waters for political alliances.

Name: Advisor Maerlen
Backstory: Maerlen arrived three winters ago without record or invitation. Cloaked in deep blue and reeking of incense, he rarely speaks and never eats in public. He claims to be a seer, but offers only riddles.
